sentences.en: An unlimited arms race may well increase the danger of war.
sentences.cn: 无限度的武器竞赛当然会增加战争的危险性.

sentences.en: An unlimited number of copies can still be made from the original.
sentences.cn: 仍可以由原件复印出无数份副本来。

sentences.en: As a university president, his prospects were unlimited.
sentences.cn: 他在大学校长里, 还是前途无量的人.

sentences.en: Boys arrange the unlimited window to throw the snow ball inwardly.
sentences.cn: 男孩子们顺敞开的窗户往里面扔雪球.

sentences.en: Can you afford to splash out a little? Is your budget unlimited?
sentences.cn: 你能稍微奢侈一点吗？你的预算是否有上限？
职业生涯几乎是前途无量。

sentences.en: Lunch was a feast of meat and vegetables, cheese, yoghurt and fruit, with unlimited wine.
sentences.cn: 午餐很丰盛，有肉、蔬菜、奶酪、酸奶、水果，酒无限量供应。

sentences.en: Malaysian Railways has a rail pass for foreign visitors: 10 days' unlimited travel costs around £53.
sentences.cn: 马来西亚铁路公司有专为外国游客准备的铁路乘车证：十日不限次乘车大约花费53英镑。

sentences.en: The daily tariff includes accommodation and unlimited use of the pool and gymnasium.
sentences.cn: 日常费用包括住宿以及游泳池和健身房的不限时使用。

sentences.en: The maximum penalty is up to 7 years imprisonment or an unlimited fine.
sentences.cn: 最高处罚是最多7年监禁或者无上限罚款。

sentences.en: The possibilities of success seem unlimited.
sentences.cn: 成功的可能看来是极大的.

sentences.en: The system can support an unlimited number of users.
sentences.cn: 该系统可以支持无限多的用户。

sentences.en: The ticket gives you unlimited travel for seven days.
sentences.cn: 凭本车票在七日内可自由乘车不受限制。

sentences.en: The ticket offers unlimited travel on the London underground for seven days.
sentences.cn: 凭本票可在七日内无限次乘坐伦敦地铁。

sentences.en: There is no safety in unlimited technological hubris.
sentences.cn: 在技术方面自以为是会很危险.

sentences.en: They flew over the unlimited reaches of the Arctic.
sentences.cn: 他们飞过了茫茫无边的北极上空.

sentences.en: They represented the Buddha as the saviour from almost unlimited torment.
sentences.cn: 他们推尊佛陀为无边苦难的救主.

words.tran_cn: [数]无限制的；无限量的；无条件的

trans.tran_cn: 无限的，无数的，过多的，过度的，无条件的
